languages.text: When the Navy Officer scores a critical hit or successfully parries an attack with their primary melee weapon, they make an attack, whichever costs the least AP, with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

traits.locale_text: When the Navy Officer scores a critical hit or successfully parries an attack with their primary melee weapon, they make an attack, whichever costs the least AP, with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

languages.text: When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack (whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

traits.locale_text: When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack, whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack (whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack (whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

languages.text: Когда офицер Имперского флота наносит врагу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический удар{/g} или успешно {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку оружием в ведущей руке, он немедленно совершает второй рукой дополнительную атаку — требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} — по той же цели.
languages.original_text: When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack, whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

traits.locale_text: Когда офицер Имперского флота наносит врагу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический удар{/g} или успешно {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку оружием в ведущей руке, он немедленно совершает второй рукой дополнительную атаку — требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} — по той же цели.

Когда офицер Имперского флота наносит врагу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический удар{/g} или успешно {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку оружием в ведущей руке, он немедленно совершает второй рукой дополнительную атаку — требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} — по той же цели.

Когда офицер Имперского флота наносит врагу {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критический удар{/g} или успешно {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку оружием в ведущей руке, он немедленно совершает второй рукой дополнительную атаку — требующую меньше всего {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} — по той же цели.

languages.text: 海軍士官が主武器で{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルヒット{/g}を与えるか、攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流し{/g}に成功した場合、同じ敵に対して副武器で直ちに攻撃を行う。この攻撃は消費{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が最も少ないものを使用する。
languages.original_text: When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack, whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}, with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

languages.text: Wenn der Offizier der Flotte einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} verursacht oder einen Angriff mit seiner primären Nahkampfwaffe {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, führt er mit seiner Sekundärwaffe gegen denselben Gegner sofort einen Angriff (der die wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet) aus.
languages.original_text: When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack (whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Offizier der Flotte einen {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Treffer{/g} verursacht oder einen Angriff mit seiner primären Nahkampfwaffe {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, führt er mit seiner Sekundärwaffe gegen denselben Gegner sofort einen Angriff (der die wenigsten {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} kostet) aus.

languages.text: Quand l'officier de marine inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} ou réussit à {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} une attaque avec son arme de mêlée principale, il assène immédiatement une attaque (celle dont le coût en {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} est le moins élevé) au même ennemi avec son arme secondaire.
languages.original_text: When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack (whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

traits.locale_text: Quand l'officier de marine inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}coup critique{/g} ou réussit à {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parer{/g} une attaque avec son arme de mêlée principale, il assène immédiatement une attaque (celle dont le coût en {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} est le moins élevé) au même ennemi avec son arme secondaire.

languages.text: Cuando el oficial de la Armada inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} un ataque con su arma cuerpo a cuerpo principal, realiza de inmediato un ataque (el que menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} cueste) con su arma secundaria contra ese mismo enemigo.
languages.original_text: When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack (whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el oficial de la Armada inflige un {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}impacto crítico{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}para{/g} un ataque con su arma cuerpo a cuerpo principal, realiza de inmediato un ataque (el que menos {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} cueste) con su arma secundaria contra ese mismo enemigo.

languages.text: 当海军军官使用主手近战武器造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击时，会立刻使用副手武器，以{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的攻击方式对同一个目标进行攻击。
languages.original_text: When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack (whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

traits.locale_text: 当海军军官使用主手近战武器造成{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}攻击时，会立刻使用副手武器，以{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}消耗最低的攻击方式对同一个目标进行攻击。

languages.text: Donanma Subayı, ana yakın dövüş silahıyla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirdiğinde veya bir saldırıyı başarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturduğunda{/g} aynı düşmana ikinci silahıyla anında bir saldırı (hangisi en az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcıyorsa) yapar.
languages.original_text: When the Navy Officer scores a {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical hit{/g} or successfully {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack with their primary melee weapon, they immediately make an attack (whichever costs the least {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}) with their secondary weapon against the same enemy.

traits.locale_text: Donanma Subayı, ana yakın dövüş silahıyla {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritik vuruş{/g} indirdiğinde veya bir saldırıyı başarıyla {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturduğunda{/g} aynı düşmana ikinci silahıyla anında bir saldırı (hangisi en az {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} harcıyorsa) yapar.
